Plot: A trio of girls set out to change the male-dominated environment of the Seven Oaks college campus, and to rescue their fellow students from depression, grunge and low standards of every kind.
Title: Damsels in Distress
Actors: Greta Gerwig, Carrie MacLemore, Megalyn Echikunwoke, Analeigh Tipton
tomatoConsensus: Damsels in Distress can sometimes feel mannered and outlandish, but it's redeemed by director Whit Stillman's oddball cleverness and Greta Gerwig's dryly funny performance.
